LABEL: 0x2CD
STRING: 「What the hell were you thinking?」

LABEL: 0x41D
STRING: Hiragino was scowling at me.

LABEL: 0x43D
STRING: It wasn't anger that seeped into his voice but exasperation.

LABEL: 0x46D
STRING: Faced with his tired gaze while sitting at his feet, my body shrank even more.

LABEL: 0x533
STRING: 「Haah...」

LABEL: 0x552
STRING: After letting out a single sigh, Hiragino repeated himself like scolding a naughty child.

LABEL: 0x616
STRING: 「You are an adult, aren't you?」

LABEL: 0x646
STRING: 「Did you not think about the dangers involved at all?」

LABEL: 0x67E
STRING: 「If you had gotten lost while out there in the sea...」

LABEL: 0x6CC
STRING: 「Why the hell did you go out there?」

LABEL: 0x75D
STRING: 「This isn't just about you.」

LABEL: 0x787
STRING: 「If you were gone, we would be in deep trouble with the ship...」

LABEL: 0x7D7
STRING: 「You'd realize that if you just thought about it a little.」

LABEL: 0x807
STRING: 「You're a researcher in the making, right?」

LABEL: 0x82F
STRING: 「If you can't even use your brain that much, what are you going to do?」

LABEL: 0x86C
STRING: 「I'm sorry...」

LABEL: 0x8A6
STRING: He was right.

LABEL: 0x8C0
STRING: I couldn't argue back at all.

LABEL: 0x8E2
STRING: I just bowed my head.

LABEL: 0x976
STRING: 「...In the first place――」

LABEL: 0xA00
STRING: 「Why did you decide to go out there again?!」

LABEL: 0xA40
STRING: 「And all alone, at that?!」

LABEL: 0xA65
STRING: 「Well――」

LABEL: 0xAED
STRING: 「Don't tell me...」

LABEL: 0xB62
STRING: 「Was it to catch this guy?」

LABEL: 0xBC7
STRING: Hiragino tapped the water tank as he spoke.

LABEL: 0xBFD
STRING: The deep aquarium was filled with seawater.

LABEL: 0xC31
STRING: Twisting gracefully in the clear water was a jellyfish with an equally transparent body.

LABEL: 0xC85
STRING: That was the only result of my off-ship exploration (of my own accord).

LABEL: 0xCC9
STRING: ...Hiragino was not far off the mark.

LABEL: 0xD07
STRING: Then again, what I was really looking for wasn't a jellyfish, but a shellfish...

LABEL: 0xD57
STRING: That said, I wasn't a man who couldn't read the mood.

LABEL: 0xD97
STRING: I didn't dare to correct Hiragino now and make him even more upset.

LABEL: 0xE38
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0xE67
STRING: 「Honestly...」

LABEL: 0xE85
STRING: 「You do understand we're in the middle of an emergency, right?」

LABEL: 0xECF
STRING: 「We still haven't been able to contact the surface.」

LABEL: 0xF0B
STRING: 「And we're extremely busy right now, too...」

LABEL: 0xF6A
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0xF80
STRING: We were supposed to be searching for Reiri in the first place.

LABEL: 0xFD0
STRING: But I had been quickly caught by Tokiwa, and...

LABEL: 0x1006
STRING: ...That was no excuse.

LABEL: 0x1030
STRING: How much time had passed since the search began?

LABEL: 0x106A
STRING: And we still hadn't found Reiri.

LABEL: 0x1096
STRING: I had been dragged along because of the promise I had made with Tokiwa,

LABEL: 0x10DE
STRING: but now that I thought about it, I had ended up abandoning my original duty.

LABEL: 0x1122
STRING: I hadn't weighed Tokiwa and Reiri against each other, but...

LABEL: 0x1162
STRING: It was my fault for not realizing that the decision was there to begin with.

LABEL: 0x11C0
STRING: Once again, there was nothing I could say in response.

LABEL: 0x11F0
STRING: I lowered my eyes in apology and looked around.

LABEL: 0x122E
STRING: I looked to my right.

LABEL: 0x12D1
STRING: Touri cast an awkward glance in my direction without saying anything.

LABEL: 0x1333
STRING: I looked to my left.

LABEL: 0x150C
STRING: Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x1522
STRING: What was she thinking, then?

LABEL: 0x1556
STRING: Why was her silence so different from Touri's?

LABEL: 0x1588
STRING: She was as carefree as ever, lingering about quietly.

LABEL: 0x15DC
STRING: Be a little more conscious of your surroundings, will you?

LABEL: 0x1636
STRING: Did she have a grasp on the situation in the first place?

LABEL: 0x1674
STRING: You're the cause of all this, I hope you're aware――

LABEL: 0x170E
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun, are you listening?」

LABEL: 0x173D
STRING: 「Y-Yes!」

LABEL: 0x1773
STRING: I straightened my back when he called my name.

LABEL: 0x179D
STRING: My feelings of remorse were heavy, but I was already starting to feel the numbness in my legs.

LABEL: 0x1850
STRING: How in the world did this happen...?

LABEL: 0x188E
STRING: Where did I go wrong?

LABEL: 0x18B0
STRING: The more I thought about it, the more resentment I felt writhing in my brain toward the airheaded girl next to me.

LABEL: 0x1959
STRING: Tokiwa had sent me off with a smile to the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x1A6D
STRING: When I returned, I was greeted by the anger of Hiragino and a bewildered Touri.

LABEL: 0x1AC9
STRING: I was even more bewildered than she was.

LABEL: 0x1B39
STRING: What was she doing?

LABEL: 0x1B59
STRING: Why was Tokiwa just standing around and not saying anything?

LABEL: 0x1BE4
STRING: 「Umm... Tokiwa-san...?」

LABEL: 0x1C0E
STRING: 「A little help here..?」

LABEL: 0x1C34
STRING: I asked her under my breath.

LABEL: 0x1C60
STRING: On the other hand, she opened her mouth with an unusually meek expression.

LABEL: 0x1D0C
STRING: 「...It happened on a certain summer day.」

LABEL: 0x1D44
STRING: 「I was waiting for Scaly in the emergency room of the deep-sea cruise ship <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x1DF6
STRING: 「――But, at that time.」

LABEL: 0x1E6D
STRING: 「...Pshaw!」

LABEL: 0x1E90
STRING: 「...Yes, I heard the door open.」

LABEL: 0x1F1F
STRING: 「Sousuke-san and Akari-chan appeared.」

LABEL: 0x1F51
STRING: 「They asked me where you were.」

LABEL: 0x1F8D
STRING: 「If I had any idea where you went.」

LABEL: 0x2010
STRING: 「...And so, I answered.」

LABEL: 0x203E
STRING: 「――"Oh, if you're looking for him, he went out into the sea earlier." ...Like that!」

LABEL: 0x208B
STRING: To be continued in the next volume.

LABEL: 0x20BF
STRING: ...Enough with the jokes.

LABEL: 0x20DD
STRING: Why did she make it sound like a decisive line from a book?

LABEL: 0x2111
STRING: It was like she was telling a mystery story all of a sudden.

LABEL: 0x213D
STRING: And that door-opening sound was way too awkward.

LABEL: 0x2173
STRING: There was a lot I wanted to comment on,

LABEL: 0x219B
STRING: but the most important question was why she had told them so frankly?

LABEL: 0x21DD
STRING: She should've come up with a clever excuse or something.

LABEL: 0x2215
STRING: She was supposed to be the lookout.

LABEL: 0x2237
STRING: And now she was making it sound like I jumped out into the sea on my own...

LABEL: 0x22F1
STRING: 「What's with that look?」

LABEL: 0x231E
STRING: 「Well... I thought maybe you could've lied a bit.」

LABEL: 0x236F
STRING: 「I won't lie.」

LABEL: 0x2394
STRING: 「...You're a good kid, huh?」

LABEL: 0x2420
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x2455
STRING: Anyway, that's how it was.

LABEL: 0x247D
STRING: Right now, I was being lectured by Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x251B
STRING: 「...Well, there's no point in saying anything more.」

LABEL: 0x2555
STRING: 「Anyway, make sure you don't act on your own again.」

LABEL: 0x25EE
STRING: 「Got it?」

LABEL: 0x260D
STRING: All I could do was nod my head.

LABEL: 0x263D
STRING: It was pathetic, but...

LABEL: 0x265D
STRING: I was finally freed――

LABEL: 0x2699
STRING: And, just then...

LABEL: 0x26B3
STRING: The emergency room door opened behind me.

LABEL: 0x26E1
STRING: I immediately kicked my diving suit toward the wall.

LABEL: 0x2717
STRING: If Yukari found out what had happened here, it would be catastrophic.

LABEL: 0x27C1
STRING: 「Everyone's here, I see.」

LABEL: 0x27EE
STRING: When had she woken up?

LABEL: 0x2814
STRING: Yukari surveyed the area and looked at Hiragino with moist eyes.

LABEL: 0x2943
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x295D
STRING: 「What's all this commotion about?」

LABEL: 0x2983
STRING: 「Your voices echoed all the way down the hallway. I couldn't even sleep in peace, honestly...」

LABEL: 0x29D8
STRING: Yukari immediately complained in a bitter tone.

LABEL: 0x29FA
STRING: She must have gotten a good night's rest because she was in peak condition.

LABEL: 0x2A2E
STRING: The way she glared at Hiragino was unusually sharp.

LABEL: 0x2A66
STRING: Even Hiragino, while flinching at Yukari's verbal assault, seemed somewhat reassured by her recovery.

LABEL: 0x2AAC
STRING: I thought that it was a good thing as well――

LABEL: 0x2B24
STRING: ...Wasn't this bad?

LABEL: 0x2B50
STRING: I thought back to yesterday's exploration of the rear section.

LABEL: 0x2B82
STRING: Objectively speaking,

LABEL: 0x2BB2
STRING: I was the one who risked his life to explore the rear section,

LABEL: 0x2BE2
STRING: and despite facing many obstacles, in the end,

LABEL: 0x2C10
STRING: I was the one who found Reiri.

LABEL: 0x2CBB
STRING: However.

LABEL: 0x2CD1
STRING: When we safely returned to the front section, what awaited me was Yukari's lecture about acting on my own.

LABEL: 0x2D35
STRING: I didn't expect to get praised or commended, but getting scolded so harshly was...

LABEL: 0x2D8B
STRING: Even with all that I had accomplished, I could only bow my head back then.

LABEL: 0x2DDB
STRING: So, that meant――

LABEL: 0x2EB3
STRING: ...The situation now wasn't just bad.

LABEL: 0x2EEB
STRING: If Yukari found out, she would get even angrier at me than Hiragino had.

LABEL: 0x2F21
STRING: And I hoped that was all that would happen...

LABEL: 0x2F85
STRING: In the worst-case scenario, could it be possible that I'd get thrown out to the sea?

LABEL: 0x2FCD
STRING: No way, right...?

LABEL: 0x300F
STRING: Cold sweat ran down my cheeks.

LABEL: 0x3031
STRING: My sweat-drenched shirt clung to my back.

LABEL: 0x3069
STRING: This was bad, this was bad, this was bad... No, I knew that already.

LABEL: 0x30B3
STRING: I had to use my head.

LABEL: 0x30D1
STRING: Somehow, I had to make sure Yukari didn't find out that I went out by myself――

LABEL: 0x31FC
STRING: 「...It was thoughtless for me to shout like that. Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x3244
STRING: 「But Momoi, listen to this.」

LABEL: 0x327B
STRING: 「Yes, what is it?」

LABEL: 0x32B0
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun, he――」

LABEL: 0x32DB
STRING: This was baaad!!

LABEL: 0x3303
STRING: 「Aahh!」

LABEL: 0x3385
STRING: 「Eh?」

LABEL: 0x3407
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x3522
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x35A0
STRING: I managed to get out of my predicament by letting out a strange voice, but...

LABEL: 0x3652
STRING: 「...Is something wrong, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x3687
STRING: 「No, um...」

LABEL: 0x3713
STRING: 「Hm? Hiragino-sensei, what's that?」

LABEL: 0x374C
STRING: 「You mean this?」

LABEL: 0x3785
STRING: Yukari's eyes were on Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x37A9
STRING: And, on the deep aquarium he was toying with on the table.

LABEL: 0x37DB
STRING: That did look very suspicious, yes.

LABEL: 0x386B
STRING: 「There's something inside, isn't there?」

LABEL: 0x38FF
STRING: 「Yeah. You see, Katagiri-san――」

LABEL: 0x393E
STRING: 「Aah, whoa there!」

LABEL: 0x399A
STRING: So this was what they meant by "out of the frying pan and into the fire."

LABEL: 0x39D6
STRING: Now it wasn't just Yukari, but also the two girls next to Hiragino that were giving me dubious looks.

LABEL: 0x3A28
STRING: ...Wasn't this worse in its own way?

LABEL: 0x3A5C
STRING: 「Ah, you see...」

LABEL: 0x3AEA
STRING: 「What is it? Out with it.」

LABEL: 0x3B77
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei has something to say, too, you know?」

LABEL: 0x3BAA
STRING: 「No, that's...!」

LABEL: 0x3C36
STRING: 「Then hurry it up.」

LABEL: 0x3CBD
STRING: 「I'll get angry if you don't cut it out, okay?」

LABEL: 0x3CF2
STRING: ...She seemed pretty angry already.

LABEL: 0x3D54
STRING: This wasn't the time to crack jokes.

LABEL: 0x3D86
STRING: I had my back against the wall.

LABEL: 0x3DA4
STRING: So, this was it...

LABEL: 0x3DC0
STRING: Continuing to make excuses would only serve to make Yukari angrier.

LABEL: 0x3E16
STRING: I was about to give up.

LABEL: 0x3E42
STRING: At that time...

LABEL: 0x3E58
STRING: The numbers on the LCD clock embedded in the wall caught my eye.

LABEL: 0x3F37
STRING: 「Look at the clock! It's already 13:00!」

LABEL: 0x3FD9
STRING: 「Would you look at that!」

LABEL: 0x3FF8
STRING: Tokiwa had realized what I was trying to do before anyone else.

LABEL: 0x4044
STRING: She raised her voice and looked at me with sparkling eyes.

LABEL: 0x40BA
STRING: ...Hmmm.

LABEL: 0x40D4
STRING: What was this strange feeling?

LABEL: 0x40F4
STRING: What I had said was certainly welcome news, so her reaction wasn't wrong per se... It just wasn't very Tokiwa-like.

LABEL: 0x4162
STRING: Was she always this perceptive?

LABEL: 0x4192
STRING: No, that couldn't be――

LABEL: 0x4220
STRING: 「If it's 13:00, then...」

LABEL: 0x42A9
STRING: 「It's time for lunch!」

LABEL: 0x42D9
STRING: 「No wonder I'm starving.」

LABEL: 0x4364
STRING: 「Come on! Everyone, let's hurry to the dining hall!」

LABEL: 0x4399
STRING: All right! This was Tokiwa, after all!

LABEL: 0x43C1
STRING: I knew it!

LABEL: 0x43DB
STRING: I didn't expect anything from you!

LABEL: 0x4419
STRING: 「We should be able to contact the surface.」

LABEL: 0x4455
STRING: 「The sooner we go to the wheelhouse, the better.」

LABEL: 0x44ED
STRING: 「Wait――」

LABEL: 0x4510
STRING: 「Or is there something more important?」

LABEL: 0x462D
STRING: 「I understand.」

LABEL: 0x464B
STRING: 「Let's go, everyone.」

LABEL: 0x4690
STRING: ...I guess I was being a little pushy.

LABEL: 0x46B4
STRING: It was such an unnatural deception.

LABEL: 0x46E2
STRING: Yukari had a clearly suspicious look on her face, but she chose not to pursue it.

LABEL: 0x4736
STRING: She probably decided that contacting the surface was more important than questioning me.

LABEL: 0x4790
STRING: Hiragino didn't try to continue the conversation either.

LABEL: 0x47C0
STRING: He released the deep aquarium he had been playing with on the table.

LABEL: 0x48C5
STRING: 「Jellyfish!」

LABEL: 0x48E9
STRING: A hand snatched the deep aquarium that was freed from Hiragino's grasp.

LABEL: 0x4931
STRING: And the owner of said hand was, of course, Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x4957
STRING: She hugged it with both arms and gazed at it with soft eyes.

LABEL: 0x499D
STRING: She stared lovingly at the transparent creature in her hands.

LABEL: 0x4A3F
STRING: 「It's... It's just...」

LABEL: 0x4A6E
STRING: What's this?

LABEL: 0x4A97
STRING: 「Oh my...

LABEL: 0x4B08
STRING: Fufufu...」

LABEL: 0x4B27
STRING: The way she smiled while mumbling to herself was the very image of a suspicious person, but, well... she seemed happy.

LABEL: 0x4BA5
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x4BBB
STRING: In the first place, I had set out to explore the deep sea in order to grant her wish.

LABEL: 0x4C0B
STRING: I wasn't able to find the Scalyfoot she asked for in the end, but...

LABEL: 0x4C6D
STRING: Even so, when I looked at Tokiwa with her narrowed eyes and a smile like a cat's...

LABEL: 0x4CB3
STRING: Even if Yukari got mad at me, I felt like she'd forgive me after seeing this.

LABEL: 0x4DD0
STRING: 「Fufufu...」

LABEL: 0x4E58
STRING: 「Good for you, Tokiwa-chan.」

LABEL: 0x4EEE
STRING: 「Akari-chan!」

LABEL: 0x4F13
STRING: ...Hearing her call Touri "Akari" felt less and less strange to me as time went on.

LABEL: 0x4F67
STRING: Touri didn't seem to mind, either.

LABEL: 0x4FCB
STRING: It was amusing, of course.

LABEL: 0x4FED
STRING: Strange, even.

LABEL: 0x500B
STRING: Naturally unnatural.

LABEL: 0x5027
STRING: The only reason we could maintain our composure despite this abnormal situation was because...

LABEL: 0x5091
STRING: ――No, no.

LABEL: 0x50AD
STRING: Touri peered at the water tank in Tokiwa's arms with great interest.

LABEL: 0x51B8
STRING: 「It's cute, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x51EF
STRING: 「Yes, fufufu...」

LABEL: 0x526E
STRING: 「...It looks delicious.」

LABEL: 0x535B
STRING: 「Ahaha, that's funny, Tokiwa-chan!」

LABEL: 0x5393
STRING: Touri laughed it off brightly.

LABEL: 0x53B7
STRING: It was certainly a funny joke――

LABEL: 0x540B
STRING: If it was a joke at all.

LABEL: 0x5425
STRING: The look in her eyes as she gazed at the water tank even as they talked was...

LABEL: 0x5463
STRING: 「Come on, let's go.」

LABEL: 0x54ED
STRING: 「Sure.」

LABEL: 0x5508
STRING: Tokiwa gave an energetic reply.

LABEL: 0x5530
STRING: She was still holding on to the deep aquarium, however.

LABEL: 0x556E
STRING: ...Wouldn't that get in the way?

LABEL: 0x558E
STRING: 「...Leave that here.」

LABEL: 0x5620
STRING: 「Why?」

LABEL: 0x5643
STRING: 「Isn't it heavy?」

LABEL: 0x5670
STRING: 「Not at all.」

LABEL: 0x5699
STRING: That said, she didn't seem that strong.

LABEL: 0x56DB
STRING: I could see her telling me she was at her limit before long.

LABEL: 0x570F
STRING: 「You don't want Yukari-san to take it away, do you?」

LABEL: 0x57AD
STRING: 「...You have a point, anomalocaris.」

LABEL: 0x57F4
STRING: Reluctantly letting go of the water tank, Tokiwa trotted out of the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x5A27
STRING: 「Are you feeling better now?」

LABEL: 0x5A58
STRING: 「Yes. Thanks to you, I was able to get some rest.」

LABEL: 0x5AED
STRING: 「Incidentally, have you cooled your head, Hiragino-sensei?」

LABEL: 0x5BAE
STRING: Hiragino turned away after being reminded of his uncharacteristically passionate shouting.

LABEL: 0x5BF4
STRING: He was being treated like this despite worrying about her.

LABEL: 0x5C1C
STRING: I felt kind of sorry for Hiragino...

LABEL: 0x5C84
STRING: Yukari, however, headed off with her shoes clacking on the floor.

LABEL: 0x5CBE
STRING: As far as I could tell, she looked a lot better and wasn't lying about getting proper rest.

LABEL: 0x5D22
STRING: She was fully recovered, or powered up, you could say.

LABEL: 0x5D5E
STRING: We headed to the wheelhouse with her in the lead.

LABEL: 0x5D96
STRING: Yukari held up her keycard, and the door opened.

LABEL: 0x5E62
STRING: Only a few authorized personnel were allowed to enter this place.

LABEL: 0x5EB8
STRING: No matter how many times I came here, the tension and exhilaration gave me goosebumps.

LABEL: 0x5EEE
STRING: ...That said, most of the exhilaration was due to another factor.

LABEL: 0x5FA6
STRING: 「I'm making the call...」

LABEL: 0x5FD3
STRING: Sitting in front of the display, Yukari declared with a serious expression.

LABEL: 0x6011
STRING: Her tone was flat and business-like,

LABEL: 0x603B
STRING: but I thought I could hear a slight shrill in her voice.

LABEL: 0x6097
STRING: As I stared at the display from the side, I couldn't help but smile.

LABEL: 0x60DB
STRING: 「With this...」

LABEL: 0x60F7
STRING: We'd be saved.

LABEL: 0x6115
STRING: The long day would finally end.

LABEL: 0x6135
STRING: ...It didn't matter to me whether I was saved or not. I was the one responsible for our current situation.

LABEL: 0x6185
STRING: And my goal hadn't been accomplished yet.

LABEL: 0x621E
STRING: ――Was this really all right?

LABEL: 0x6248
STRING: An idle thought flashed in my mind.

LABEL: 0x6262
STRING: A demon disguised as a black dog.

LABEL: 0x6284
STRING: ――Was I sure this was okay?

LABEL: 0x62AE
STRING: ――We'd really make it back to the surface and put an end to everything at this rate...

LABEL: 0x635D
STRING: Don!

LABEL: 0x63CE
STRING: 「Ouch!」

LABEL: 0x63F3
STRING: 「Buhii!」

LABEL: 0x6412
STRING: The sudden impact on my back brought me back to my senses.

LABEL: 0x6440
STRING: When I turned around, I saw Tokiwa rubbing her reddened forehead.

LABEL: 0x64EA
STRING: 「Excuse me.」

LABEL: 0x6536
STRING: 「Sorry for interrupting your thoughts.」

LABEL: 0x6565
STRING: 「My thoughts?」

LABEL: 0x65ED
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x6656
STRING: What was I thinking just now?

LABEL: 0x6682
STRING: What had my actions made everyone go through?

LABEL: 0x66B6
STRING: What had they felt?

LABEL: 0x66DA
STRING: Surely you haven't forgotten...

LABEL: 0x6704
STRING: I vigorously shook my head and looked at the display again.

LABEL: 0x6744
STRING: We would contact the surface.

LABEL: 0x6764
STRING: Which was a good thing, of course...

LABEL: 0x6819
STRING: Suddenly, the side of Touri's face caught my eye.

LABEL: 0x6841
STRING: There was no sign of the brightness she displayed to Tokiwa a few minutes ago.

LABEL: 0x6897
STRING: ...Reiri's whereabouts were still unknown, after all.

LABEL: 0x68CD
STRING: If she was still just unconscious but safe, there'd be some relief, at least.

LABEL: 0x6925
STRING: However, I couldn't think of any reason why she'd disappear again after being rescued.

LABEL: 0x6983
STRING: We didn't know if she'd been caught up in some accident or harmed by someone...

LABEL: 0x69DF
STRING: If she was alive, she could only be in the front section.

LABEL: 0x6A21
STRING: And yet, there was no trace of her. What was going on...?

LABEL: 0x6ABA
STRING: 「It'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x6B40
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x6B63
STRING: 「Once we make contact, I'm sure...」

LABEL: 0x6B8F
STRING: Just what was I talking about?

LABEL: 0x6BBF
STRING: Was I saying we'd find Reiri for sure once we contacted the surface?

LABEL: 0x6C1B
STRING: That was deceptive.

LABEL: 0x6C37
STRING: Did I really think I could comfort Touri with words like that?

LABEL: 0x6C79
STRING: ...But even so, I thought I had to say something.

LABEL: 0x6CBF
STRING: Touri's sad face tugged at my heart for some reason.

LABEL: 0x6CF9
STRING: For a moment, she looked dumbfounded, but then a faint smile rose to her face.

LABEL: 0x6DA7
STRING: 「...Yeah, you're right!」

LABEL: 0x6E2A
STRING: 「Thanks, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x6E55
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x6E6F
STRING: A painful smile.

LABEL: 0x6E8B
STRING: No... I didn't want her to make a face like that.

LABEL: 0x6EE3
STRING: She looked away and bit her lip.

LABEL: 0x6F07
STRING: The unbearable silence between us was suddenly cut off.

LABEL: 0x6F52
STRING: 「The transmission is ready.」

LABEL: 0x6F78
STRING: 「I'm going to send a message to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x6FBD
STRING: Finally, huh?

LABEL: 0x6FD9
STRING: Yukari's fingers slid across the control panel.

LABEL: 0x700D
STRING: And... she started the transmission to the surface.

LABEL: 0x70C4
STRING: 「Mayday, mayday, mayday.」

LABEL: 0x70F2
STRING: 「This is the <SHEEP III>, <SHEEP III>...」

LABEL: 0x712B
STRING: We sent out a ping.

LABEL: 0x7145
STRING: From the depths of darkness, beyond the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x7175
STRING: To someone up on the wide surface, somewhere.

LABEL: 0x71A1
STRING: The feeble voice of the <SHEEP III> rose alone through the cold sea without stopping.

LABEL: 0x723A
STRING: 「...Please, respond.」

LABEL: 0x725A
STRING: 「Mayday, mayday, mayday...」

LABEL: 0x7291
STRING: She repeated the message.

LABEL: 0x72B3
STRING: Many, many times...

LABEL: 0x72E1
STRING: ...But how long would it take?

LABEL: 0x7315
STRING: Until it reached someone?

LABEL: 0x7333
STRING: Until we established contact?

LABEL: 0x7353
STRING: But... when would that be?

LABEL: 0x7385
STRING: Would her message reach the surface at all?

LABEL: 0x73DB
STRING: Would there be anyone listening to her voice in the end?

LABEL: 0x760C
STRING: We stared at the big display in anticipation.

LABEL: 0x7644
STRING: Everyone's faces were full of hope.

LABEL: 0x76D3
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x76E9
STRING: How long would that last?

LABEL: 0x7717
STRING: When hope died, it didn't just disappear.

LABEL: 0x775B
STRING: Dead hope was called despair.

LABEL: 0x7795
STRING: And I didn't want to make the girls any sadder――

LABEL: 0x77D1
STRING: Nothing had changed so far, no matter how you looked at it.

LABEL: 0x7837
STRING: All we could do was wait――

LABEL: 0x78D0
STRING: 『――――Tchht』

LABEL: 0x78EC
STRING: There was a sudden noise.

LABEL: 0x790A
STRING: It was an impulse indicating the input of a voice signal.

LABEL: 0x79B5
STRING: It didn't take long for everyone to understand what that meant.

LABEL: 0x79F5
STRING: 『――This is the exploration vessel <Yuunagi>.』

LABEL: 0x7A2B
STRING: ――My worries were all unfounded.

LABEL: 0x7AA5
STRING: Yukari stood up noisily.

LABEL: 0x7ACB
STRING: When she turned around, she looked almost scared.

LABEL: 0x7B0D
STRING: Not knowing what to say, her open mouth eventually trembled.

LABEL: 0x7C4A
STRING: 「We're... connected!」

LABEL: 0x7CE2
STRING: 「Really?!」

LABEL: 0x7CFC
STRING: 「D-Did it really go through?!」

LABEL: 0x7D33
STRING: Touri raised her voice in disbelief.

LABEL: 0x7DA3
STRING: Yukari nodded her head slightly.

LABEL: 0x7E51
STRING: 「We've gotten in touch with an exploration vessel.」

LABEL: 0x7E7F
STRING: 「I didn't think it would happen this easily...」

LABEL: 0x7EC8
STRING: 「Bravo, Momoi!!」

LABEL: 0x7F0B
STRING: Even though she'd announced it herself, Yukari still didn't seem to believe that we had successfully contacted the surface.

LABEL: 0x7F5D
STRING: Hiragino hugged her shoulders tightly.

LABEL: 0x8052
STRING: 「You really are brilliant!!」

LABEL: 0x80E0
STRING: 「It was nothing!!」

LABEL: 0x8145
STRING: Yukari pushed him away from her as if trying to shake off an annoying boss.

LABEL: 0x81FD
STRING: 「Besides, Hiragino-sensei――」

LABEL: 0x8361
STRING: 「Yay!!」

LABEL: 0x8433
STRING: 「We did it!! Tokiwa-chan!!」

LABEL: 0x84D4
STRING: 「Yay.」

LABEL: 0x84F1
STRING: Touri's earlier anxiety was gone, and she let out a cry of joy.

LABEL: 0x8533
STRING: Meanwhile, Tokiwa raised her hands like a surrendering soldier.

LABEL: 0x8575
STRING: With a straight face.

LABEL: 0x85C9
STRING: ...Something from before flashed before my eyes.

LABEL: 0x8601
STRING: I had always thought she was a strange one from the moment we met, but...

LABEL: 0x8643
STRING: The girlish smile befitting her age as she held that jellyfish was still fresh in my memory, so I felt very uneasy about this.

LABEL: 0x86AB
STRING: Why did she react more to the jellyfish than us contacting the surface?

LABEL: 0x8713
STRING: Honestly, I didn't understand her mind at all.

LABEL: 0x874F
STRING: 「Haah...」

LABEL: 0x8769
STRING: I sighed.

LABEL: 0x8793
STRING: ...However.

LABEL: 0x87AB
STRING: We had contacted the surface.

LABEL: 0x87CF
STRING: Now, we could call for help.

LABEL: 0x87F3
STRING: Now, we could return to the surface――

LABEL: 0x887F
STRING: 「This is the deep-sea cruise ship <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x88AC
STRING: 「We sank and lost power as we dove through Kurama Bay and are currently stuck on the seabed.」

LABEL: 0x88FA
STRING: 「We're requesting for help.」

LABEL: 0x891B
STRING: Yukari calmed down and sat down again after a moment.

LABEL: 0x8955
STRING: After taking a deep breath, she resumed communication with the <Yuunagi>.

LABEL: 0x8995
STRING: ...She tried to put on a serious face but couldn't hide her joy.

LABEL: 0x89DD
STRING: 『――This is <Yuunagi>. Roger that.』

LABEL: 0x8A0B
STRING: 『I'd like a report on your situation. Over.』

LABEL: 0x8A44
STRING: 「This is <SHEEP III>. Understood.」

LABEL: 0x8A6D
STRING: 「The third and second floors of the rear section are submerged. The situation is normal in the front section...」

LABEL: 0x8AA9
STRING: 「There are no problems around the hatch.」

LABEL: 0x8ACD
STRING: 「...Currently, we've confirmed six survivors. Over.」

LABEL: 0x8B0B
STRING: 『This is <Yuunagi>. Understood.』

LABEL: 0x8B35
STRING: 『Report your current coordinates. Over.』

LABEL: 0x8B78
STRING: 「This is <SHEEP III>. Understood.」

LABEL: 0x8BA1
STRING: 「Our current coordinates are――」

LABEL: 0x8BE0
STRING: The conversation they had was plain and to the point.

LABEL: 0x8C04
STRING: Yukari's calm voice filled the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x8C44
STRING: ...This didn't feel real to me.

LABEL: 0x8C72
STRING: I'd been too pessimistic before and had a hard time dealing with things as they were now.

LABEL: 0x8D28
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x8D49
STRING: Touri entered my field of vision as I was hesitating.

LABEL: 0x8D7B
STRING: She smiled sweetly as she looked at my face and tilted her head.

LABEL: 0x8E2B
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x8ED4
STRING: 「Not "Huh,"

LABEL: 0x8F4B
STRING: aren't you happy?」

LABEL: 0x8FC6
STRING: 「We're saved!」

LABEL: 0x8FF5
STRING: 「Ah, yeah...」

LABEL: 0x9013
STRING: She was right.

LABEL: 0x9027
STRING: We were saved.

LABEL: 0x904F
STRING: Saved...

LABEL: 0x9083
STRING: ――We were saved, huh?

LABEL: 0x90A7
STRING: It was so sudden that I couldn't even laugh it off.

LABEL: 0x90E7
STRING: Slowly, the situation the <SHEEP III> found itself in was transmitted to the ground.

LABEL: 0x9130
STRING: Each word led us closer to the surface.

LABEL: 0x91DC
STRING: 「...There are no problems regarding oxygen or food.」

LABEL: 0x9208
STRING: 「No signs of fire.」

LABEL: 0x922A
STRING: 「As things stand, the situation is stable. We're hoping for a quick rescue. Over.」

LABEL: 0x92E4
STRING: 『This... nagi... rstood.... help....』

LABEL: 0x9324
STRING: It came out of nowhere.

LABEL: 0x9350
STRING: Sensing the strange atmosphere, Yukari repeated her words.

LABEL: 0x93F2
STRING: 「Tch――This is <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x941B
STRING: 「There's too much interference. Repeat, please. Over.」

LABEL: 0x9507
STRING: Everyone was staring at Yukari anxiously.

LABEL: 0x9535
STRING: She opened her mouth to the microphone but ground her teeth, unable to say anything.

LABEL: 0x9595
STRING: We had transitioned from hope to despair――

LABEL: 0x95BD
STRING: In an instant, the temperature in the wheelhouse dropped.

LABEL: 0x95ED
STRING: Everyone searched for the right words to say but kept silent.

LABEL: 0x9631
STRING: Failure.

LABEL: 0x9645
STRING: We had failed again.

LABEL: 0x9665
STRING: We couldn't be rescued in the end.

LABEL: 0x9685
STRING: The atmosphere in the room was suffocating.

LABEL: 0x96AD
STRING: It was the same as the moment when the <SHEEP III> began to sink.

LABEL: 0x96E4
STRING: Where things should be fine, but went wrong.

LABEL: 0x9712
STRING: Taking a turn for the worse, more than you could imagine...

LABEL: 0x97AF
STRING: ――It was strange.

LABEL: 0x97CB
STRING: It was strange, right?

LABEL: 0x97E7
STRING: What the hell was this?

LABEL: 0x9805
STRING: Was there something wrong with the outside world?

LABEL: 0x982F
STRING: Submarines used super-directive ultrasonic waves to communicate.

LABEL: 0x986D
STRING: It didn't matter if it was physical or not. There was no way there would be this much noise mixed in from normal obstacles.

LABEL: 0x98D5
STRING: Despite that, all of a sudden, the communication line that was fine until now became like this.

LABEL: 0x9978
STRING: ――It wasn't possible!

LABEL: 0x9A0A
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x9A2D
STRING: 「Sorry. I just...」

LABEL: 0x9A71
STRING: I took up position next to Yukari, who was still trying to contact the vessel, and reached for the control panel from the side.

LABEL: 0x9ADD
STRING: My movements were heavier compared to yesterday.

LABEL: 0x9B0B
STRING: I hadn't done anything, so what's with this line load?!

LABEL: 0x9B47
STRING: This was clearly strange.

LABEL: 0x9B67
STRING: This――

LABEL: 0x9B7F
STRING: 「――This is bad.」

LABEL: 0x9B9B
STRING: 「Buffer overflow...?」

LABEL: 0x9BCD
STRING: Was the load from the data communication putting pressure on the line itself?

LABEL: 0x9C0D
STRING: Then, how did we contact the surface...?

LABEL: 0x9C39
STRING: ――But.

LABEL: 0x9C51
STRING: Was that even possible?

LABEL: 0x9C79
STRING: I'd already looked over the system here.

LABEL: 0x9CB5
STRING: There was no way such a simple bug could have been overlooked in the first place.

LABEL: 0x9D54
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x9D70
STRING: I thought of a possibility.

LABEL: 0x9D9C
STRING: 「No way――」

LABEL: 0x9DB8
STRING: 「Is it being cracked right now...?」

LABEL: 0x9E4B
STRING: Just then.

LABEL: 0x9E5F
STRING: There was a snapping sound, like something being cut off.

LABEL: 0x9E9B
STRING: With that, even the white background noise vanished from the speakers.

LABEL: 0x9F03
STRING: Silence enveloped the wheelhouse once more.

LABEL: 0x9F58
STRING: 「What in the hell is going on here?」

LABEL: 0x9F8F
STRING: His eyes looked bewildered.

LABEL: 0x9FB3
STRING: And, a little suspicious.

LABEL: 0x9FD5
STRING: Hiragino furrowed his brow and spat out a question along with his unspoken feelings.

LABEL: 0xA089
STRING: 「Isn't the system back online?」

LABEL: 0xA0BD
STRING: 「Well, Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0xA0E8
STRING: 「No, this is...」

LABEL: 0xA10A
STRING: This was not my doing.

LABEL: 0xA12C
STRING: Well, saying that now wouldn't solve anything, but...

LABEL: 0xA172
STRING: Even I had my pride.

LABEL: 0xA1AA
STRING: 「...What I'm about to say isn't necessarily 100%% correct.」

LABEL: 0xA1EF
STRING: 「However...」

LABEL: 0xA239
STRING: 「Someone has sent a huge amount of data to the server here.」

LABEL: 0xA27B
STRING: 「That data flooded the line, and we couldn't hear the voice communication anymore.」

LABEL: 0xA35D
STRING: 「Someone, you say...」

LABEL: 0xA37B
STRING: 「Who the hell could that be?」

LABEL: 0xA3A2
STRING: 「I don't know.」

LABEL: 0xA3D8
STRING: 「There's only so much data that can be transmitted in from the outside.」

LABEL: 0xA438
STRING: 「I can't deny the possibility, but...」

LABEL: 0xA496
STRING: Yukari had said that hacking to the bottom of the sea was impossible without radio waves.

LABEL: 0xA4F0
STRING: However, if they attacked the system itself on the surface and sent the data from there to the <SHEEP III>...

LABEL: 0xA553
STRING: It should be possible to crack this system from the ground.

LABEL: 0xA59D
STRING: After all, the central control system on the ground had the authority to rewrite even the core executives of the main computer here.

LABEL: 0xA613
STRING: Although...

LABEL: 0xA62B
STRING: There was another possibility.

LABEL: 0xA651
STRING: And that one was more realistic.

LABEL: 0xA67F
STRING: 「All the computers in this submarine are connected by a network.」

LABEL: 0xA6CD
STRING: 「And the one controlling it is the main computer here.」

LABEL: 0xA717
STRING: In other words, even without any tampering, you could say that all the terminals on the ship were directly connected to the main computer via a brazen line.

LABEL: 0xA847
STRING: 「...Someone accessed another computer in this submarine...」

LABEL: 0xA883
STRING: 「They then sent excessive data through the local network to the main computer.」

LABEL: 0xA8DF
STRING: 「...If you think about it that way, it makes sense.」

LABEL: 0xA91A
STRING: 「...I get what you're trying to say.」

LABEL: 0xA9A9
STRING: 「But that's still just a guess.」

LABEL: 0xA9E9
STRING: 「If you're right, then who, why, and from where did they send the data?」

LABEL: 0xAA4E
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0xAAFF
STRING: ――Think.

LABEL: 0xAB19
STRING: Think about it.

LABEL: 0xAB33
STRING: Even if it was from another computer inside the <SHEEP III>, there weren't that many that were operable.

LABEL: 0xAB96
STRING: Personal electronics were strictly controlled. I had to give away my tablet when I boarded.

LABEL: 0xAC02
STRING: Since we weren't connected to the Internet, the only network-related equipment in the guest rooms was a POL terminal at most.

LABEL: 0xAC81
STRING: But POL didn't accept anything besides voice input. It was probably impossible to write a program like that.

LABEL: 0xACF6
STRING: Of course, this submarine was loaded with countless circuits, but if no terminal could be operated...

LABEL: 0xAD58
STRING: A terminal for users...

LABEL: 0xAD80
STRING: Where had I seen those inside the <SHEEP III>...?

LABEL: 0xAF52
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0xAF75
STRING: 「――The library...」

LABEL: 0xB00C
STRING: The library of <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xB033
STRING: Was there a server for calling up the enormous amount of book data?

LABEL: 0xB079
STRING: No, there were no servers there.

LABEL: 0xB0A5
STRING: I hadn't seen any when I went there.

LABEL: 0xB0E3
STRING: It could have been hidden, of course, but...

LABEL: 0xB18B
STRING: ...Yeah, that had to be it.

LABEL: 0xB1B5
STRING: Even classified information other than book data could be extracted from the server as long as you had a dongle.

LABEL: 0xB201
STRING: There was no way something like that would be set up in a place where anyone could go in and out of freely.

LABEL: 0xB25F
STRING: The terminals in the library.

LABEL: 0xB281
STRING: They were in the local network.

LABEL: 0xB2A7
STRING: And the network was connected to the main computer of the <SHEEP III> itself.

LABEL: 0xB2E2
STRING: If that was the case, then.... we had to hurry!

LABEL: 0xB365
STRING: I stood up and turned on my heel.

LABEL: 0xB389
STRING: 「Wait here!」

LABEL: 0xB41D
STRING: 「Wait!」

LABEL: 0xB43C
STRING: 「What is it?!」

LABEL: 0xB467
STRING: 「Where are you――」

LABEL: 0xB48C
STRING: It was just a theory, so I wasn't sure if it was okay to tell them, but...

LABEL: 0xB4D4
STRING: 「――To the library!」

LABEL: 0xB4F8
STRING: 「The culprit might be in there!」

LABEL: 0xB53F
STRING: 「Why in the library...?」

LABEL: 0xB56E
STRING: 「There's no time! If we don't go now...」

LABEL: 0xB618
STRING: 「...It's dangerous to go by yourself.」

LABEL: 0xB659
STRING: Hiragino stood up.

LABEL: 0xB686
STRING: 「Explain it later!」

LABEL: 0xB71B
STRING: I opened the door and dashed out.

LABEL: 0xB73D
STRING: We were headed to the room right next to us.

LABEL: 0xB763
STRING: The library――

LABEL: 0xB77F
STRING: I rushed inside without even checking the display plate.

LABEL: 0xB85B
STRING: It was a room that should have been empty.

LABEL: 0xB87F
STRING: The room was dimly lit.

LABEL: 0xB899
STRING: In one corner...

LABEL: 0xB8B1
STRING: ...There was a single monitor that was on.

LABEL: 0xB8ED
STRING: 「You're...」

LABEL: 0xB912
STRING: And, sitting in front of the monitor,

LABEL: 0xB92E
STRING: was a girl who hadn't moved an inch.

LABEL: 0xB950
STRING: She was...

LABEL: 0xBA2F
STRING: 「That was fast.」

LABEL: 0xBA62
STRING: 「...Reiri.」

LABEL: 0xBA81
STRING: There sat the girl we had all been looking for.
